DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy Safety Empegfilgrastim Neutropenia Prophylaxis Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: BCD-017-3 double-blind randomized phase III clinical study compare incidence CTCAE grade 3/4 neutropenia single administration recombinant human pegylated filgrastim empegfilgrastim ( Extimia® ) dose 6 7.5 mg versus daily administration filgrastim dose 5 μg/kg/day neutropenia prophylaxis breast cancer patient receive myelosuppressive chemotherapy . The study also include follow determination pharmacokinetic parameter repeat administration study drug .
